H0.text: The Grand Canyon was formed when the landmass on the Indian plate collided with the landmass on the Eurasian plate between 40 and 50 million years ago.

H1.text: The Great Plains formed when the landmass on the Indian plate collided with the landmass on the Eurasian plate between 40 and 50 million years ago.

H2.text: The Himalayan Mountains formed when the landmass on the Indian plate collided with the landmass on the Eurasian plate between 40 and 50 million years ago.

H3.text: The Mariana Trench formed when the landmass on the Indian plate collided with the landmass on the Eurasian plate between 40 and 50 million years ago.

A4.text: The collision of India with Eurasia closed the Neo-Tethys Ocean.

A5.text: The closure of the Neotethys was completed approximately 40 Ma.
